Scott Chamberlain programmerist

Software

R

Most of these are collaborative projects, of which I am the maintainer

taxize A taxonomic toolbelt for R.</br> rgbif Interface to GBIF.</br> rplos Interace to the Public Library of Science search API.</br> alm An R client for the PLOS Lagotto altmetrics application.</br> solrium R client for Apache SOLR.</br> elastic R client for Elasticsearch.</br> analogsea R client for Digital Ocean</br> rnoaa R client for many NOAA datasets</br> rphylopic R client for Phylopic</br> cowsay Like the command line program cowsay, but for R</br> rgauges R client for Gaug.es website analytics API</br> (defunct) rbhl R client for the Biodiversity Heritage Library</br> httping R client to ping urls to time requests.</br> rcrossref R client for various CrossRef APIs</br> vcr Record HTTP calls and replay them. Port of the Ruby gem of the same name.</br> rbison Wrapper to the USGS Bison API.</br> rerddap Work with ERDDAP servers.</br> musemeta Scrape Museum Metadata.</br> gistr Interact with GitHub gists from R.</br> rif Neuroscience Information Network client.</br> lawn turf.js R client.</br> geojsonio Convert many data formats to & from GeoJSON & TopoJSON.</br> wellknown Go from well known text to GeoJSON and back.

Python

habanero A Python client for the Crossref search API.</br> pygbif A Python client for the GBIF API.</br> pytaxize A Python port of the R taxize library.</br> pyalm A Python client for the Lagotto API.

Ruby

serrano A Python client for the Crossref search API.</br> textminer Client to do text-mining via Crossref metadata - built on serrano.</br> cites Search for and get citations from the command line.</br> lagotto-rb A Ruby gem for the PLOS Lagotto altmetrics application.</br> veyor A Ruby gem for the Appveyor API.</br> rubrb A command line tool to help with R tasks - a weird thing, I know.
